Introduction

ISHA, also known as Gowoon, is a South Korean singer-songwriter under COSMIK RAIDERS. She is a former member of the girl group Berry Good and its sub-unit Berry Good HEART HEART. She made her solo debut on February 20, 2021, with the digital single "City Lights".
